org.graalvm.tools.insight.heap

Class HeapDump

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.graalvm.tools.insight.heap.HeapDump

  • public final class HeapDump
extends Object
    Support for generating .hprof files in Java Profiler Heap Dump Format. 

    HeapDump.Builder builder = HeapDump.newHeapBuilder(new FileOutputStream(hprof));
builder.dumpHeap((heap) -> {
    final HeapDump.ClassInstance classActor = heap.newClass("cartoons.Actor").
        field("name", String.class).
        field("friend", Object.class).
        field("age", int.class).
        dumpClass();
    final HeapDump.ObjectInstance jerry = heap.newInstance(classActor).
        put("name", heap.dumpString("Jerry")).
        putInt("age", 47).
        // field 'friend' remains null
        dumpInstance();
    final HeapDump.ObjectInstance tom = heap.newInstance(classActor).
        put("name", heap.dumpString("Tom")).
        put("friend", jerry).
        putInt("age", 32).
        dumpInstance();
    final HeapDump.ClassInstance classMain = heap.newClass("cartoons.Main").
        field("tom", classActor).
        field("jerry", classActor).
        field("thread", java.lang.com.oracle.truffle.tools.dap.types.Thread.class).
        dumpClass();

    HeapDump.InstanceBuilder mainBuilder = heap.newInstance(classMain);
    final HeapDump.ObjectInstance main = mainBuilder.id();
    mainBuilder.put("tom", tom).put("jerry", jerry);

    HeapDump.ObjectInstance cathingThread = heap.newThread("Catching Jerry").
        addStackFrame(classActor, "tom", "Actor.java", -1, jerry, tom, main).
        addStackFrame(classMain, "main", "Main.java", -1, main).
        dumpThread();

    mainBuilder.put("thread", cathingThread).dumpInstance();
});
    Since:
    21.1

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HeapDump.ArrayBuilder
      Fills data for new array to put into the HeapDump.
      class  HeapDump.Builder
      Builder to construct content of the heap dump file.
      class  HeapDump.ClassBuilder
      Builds structure of a new class for the HeapDump.
      class  HeapDump.ClassInstance
      Represents a class in the HeapDump.
      class  HeapDump.InstanceBuilder
      Fills data for new object instance to put into the HeapDump.
      class  HeapDump.ObjectInstance
      Represents an object instance in the HeapDump.
      class  HeapDump.ThreadBuilder
      Allows one to describe a state of a thread with local variables and record it in the generated HeapDump.

    • Method Detail

      • newHeapBuilder

        public static HeapDump.Builder newHeapBuilder(OutputStream os)
                                       throws IOException
        Starts generating new .hprof file. Follow with HeapDump.Builder.dumpHeap(java.util.function.Consumer<org.graalvm.tools.insight.heap.HeapDump>) call. 

        HeapDump.Builder builder = HeapDump.newHeapBuilder(new FileOutputStream(hprof));
builder.dumpHeap((heap) -> {
    final HeapDump.ClassInstance classActor = heap.newClass("cartoons.Actor").
        field("name", String.class).
        field("friend", Object.class).
        field("age", int.class).
        dumpClass();
    final HeapDump.ObjectInstance jerry = heap.newInstance(classActor).
        put("name", heap.dumpString("Jerry")).
        putInt("age", 47).
        // field 'friend' remains null
        dumpInstance();
    final HeapDump.ObjectInstance tom = heap.newInstance(classActor).
        put("name", heap.dumpString("Tom")).
        put("friend", jerry).
        putInt("age", 32).
        dumpInstance();
    final HeapDump.ClassInstance classMain = heap.newClass("cartoons.Main").
        field("tom", classActor).
        field("jerry", classActor).
        field("thread", java.lang.com.oracle.truffle.tools.dap.types.Thread.class).
        dumpClass();

    HeapDump.InstanceBuilder mainBuilder = heap.newInstance(classMain);
    final HeapDump.ObjectInstance main = mainBuilder.id();
    mainBuilder.put("tom", tom).put("jerry", jerry);

    HeapDump.ObjectInstance cathingThread = heap.newThread("Catching Jerry").
        addStackFrame(classActor, "tom", "Actor.java", -1, jerry, tom, main).
        addStackFrame(classMain, "main", "Main.java", -1, main).
        dumpThread();

    mainBuilder.put("thread", cathingThread).dumpInstance();
});
        Parameters:
        os - output stream to write data to
        Returns:
        new builder
        Throws:
        IOException - on I/O error

      • dumpString

        public HeapDump.ObjectInstance dumpString(String text)
                                   throws UncheckedIOException
        Builds new string instance in the HeapDump. Encodes the value as an instance of java.lang.String with value field holding the char[] of the provided text.
        Parameters:
        text - the text of the string
        Returns:
        instance representing the string in the heap.
        Throws:
        UncheckedIOException - when an I/O error occurs
        Since:
        21.1

      • dumpPrimitive

        public HeapDump.ObjectInstance dumpPrimitive(Object obj)
                                      throws UncheckedIOException
        Dumps a primitive value (int, long, float, byte, char & other) into the HeapDump. Encodes the value as appropriate boxed object ( Integer, Long, Float, Byte, Character & co.).
        Parameters:
        obj - primitive value
        Returns:
        object instance representing the value in the heap
        Throws:
        UncheckedIOException - when an I/O error occurs
        Since:
        21.1
